item.title: Crewmember Interphone Systems Upper Deck Call and Communication System

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided Courier/ Supernumerary compartment remains unoccupied.

note.para: Any mode which functions normally may be used.

numlitem.para: The Courier/Supernumerary compartment must remain unoccupied.

placard.para: Placard Crewmember Interphone System Flight Deck to Ground "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
